Posted By: TwentyFifthBaam (10/19/2012 12:13:43 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
One of the best black cards there is. It has been a long time coming for a card of this nature to be printed. The nature of the card fits with white but this card definitely makes sense in black. I have 4 in my deck and it is one of the cornerstones of how my deck functions. I just hope they never reprint it..they already have [Wrath of God](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Wrath of God) for that. I just wonder if there will ever be a black version of [Armageddon](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Armageddon )  printed.  
  
What would REALLY be awesome is if there was some type of 'End of Days'' card where all players put all permanents that they control into their graveyards, then discard their entire hands, then all players exile their graveyards. There may already be one for all I know..
posts.html:
One of the best black cards there is. It has been a long time coming for a card of this nature to be printed. The nature of the card fits with white but this card definitely makes sense in black. I have 4 in my deck and it is one of the cornerstones of how my deck functions. I just hope they never reprint it..they already have Wrath of God for that. I just wonder if there will ever be a black version of Armageddon printed.

What would REALLY be awesome is if there was some type of 'End of Days'' card where all players put all permanents that they control into their graveyards, then discard their entire hands, then all players exile their graveyards. There may already be one for all I know..
